content: you have an even number of stitches total but an odd number when divided in half establish flying north texture begin with round 1 of the chart or follow written instructions below for the top of the foot on needle one the stitches on needle two will be the bottom of the foot and are not charted always knit all stitches on needle two written instructions these instructions are for the top of the foot needle one only the stitches on needle two will be the bottom of the foot and will always be knit round 1 k15 p1 k15 round 2 k14 p1 k1 p1 k14 round 3 k13 p1 k3 p1 k13 round 4 k12 p1 k5 k4 round 13 k3 p1 k23 p1 k3 round 14 k2 p1 k25 p1 k2 round 15 knit around 3 repeat rounds 1-15 until the foot measures approximately 1 75 inches 4 5cm less than the length of your foot you do not need to complete a 15 round repeat before working the heel you will pick up wherever you left off when you begin the leg of the sock heel work your heel of choice on needle two many types of heels will work for this pattern for example the fish lips kiss heel by the sox therapist $1 pattern on ravelry or the afterthought heel socks by laura linneman free pattern on ravelry i find that heel preference can be very personal and there are many great heel patterns available on ravelry and the internet if you have a favorite heel you use to knit socks use it leg continue to work the texture pattern only on the front of the sock until you reach round 1 now work the texture pattern around the leg working the texture on both needles one and two continue with the texture pattern rounds 1-15 until you reach your desired leg length ending with round 15 cuff work k1 p1 around for approximately 1 inch 2 5cm or desired length bind off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off http //www knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php or stretchy bind off of your choice >>> 4 finishing cut yarn and with a tapestry needle weave in all the ends on the wrong side of the fabric soak socks inside out in a mild detergent or wool wash squeeze out excess water without twisting the fabric lay on a flat surface to block and dry notes on sizing and alterations if you prefer to work socks cuff down you can easily modify this pattern keep in mind that you may not be able to choose the position of the last
